page.title: 06Spring Vale Primary School
page.content: I go to Spring Vale Primary school. The school is twenty five years old. There are ten classes and a nursery. This year there are 275 children at school in total. The school staff consists of the Head master, deputy head, the teachers, secretary, cooks, cleaners, and caretaker. There are fourteen teachers. In winter the caretaker has to stoke the boilers and clear the paths of snow. The Secretary has to count dinner money, type out letters and look after the lunch boxes. Each morning we begin with an assembly. Our lessons are English, Mathematics, Art, handwriting, spelling, stories, History,P.E. and Topic work. This year we have done a topic on "Our School" as it is our Jubilee year. On the last day of term we have a sing- song in the Hall.
